title: PRTTYGARDEN Womens Long Sleeve Maxi Dress 2025 Spring Trendy Elegant V Neck Flowy Wedding Guest Holiday Formal Long Dresses
description: Size attention: S=US 4-6; M=US 8-10; L=US 12-14; XL=US 16-18; 2XL=20. Please refer to the size chart before ordering. The white, pink and light blue colors of this spring flowy dresses have linings of the same color, while the dark color has no lining

Features: The semi-formal maxi dress features classic V-neck, long sleeves, high waist, a line, smocked, buttons decoration, elasticated cuffs and solid color. Spring photoshoot dress for women is relaxed fit,maxi length,elegant and charming, showing your charm

Occasion: Spring dresses for women 2025 is fit for both casual and formal occasion.Such as daily wear, shopping,parties, clubs, night out, dates, birthday, cocktail, brunch, homecoming, wedding guest, bridal shower, vacation, beach, resort wear, cruise and etc

Matching: This long sleeve maxi dress can be paired with high heels or loafers. Accessorize with a chic necklace and earrings for a more feminine look. You can also pair this flowy spring dresses with a cardigan/shawl for a warm and stylish look in cold day
Wash Care: This winter wedding guest long dress can be hand washed in cold water and machine washed
